file_content.text: Hurry, hunter! Vexx could be on that shuttle already!
Only the boldest make it into the Great Hunt, and Vexx is a bold target. He's a champion gunslinger. Completely ruthless.
What do you say, hunter? You ready to take down Vexx all by yourself?
I'm always ready.
Of course I am.
That's exactly what I wanted to hear.
Sure that's a good idea?
Alone, huh?
Of course I'm sure. You're the best shot I've ever seen. You just lack experience.
If I take down Vexx alone, I'm keeping the reward.
My kill, my credits.
Nice try. No one works for free here--it's an even split among the group.
If you head out now, you'll catch Vexx at the shuttle port before he escapes.
Bring back Vexx's ID tags as proof that you're the one who got him. Anything else he carries is yours to keep.
No need to wish me luck. Vexx is already mine.
Understood.
Look at her, so cool under pressure!
Look at him, so cool under pressure!
With any luck, it won't come to violence.
I'll bring him in peacefully.
Vexx doesn't strike me as the surrendering type. I doubt he'll let you take him alive.
I sure hope he doesn't surrender.
Finally, a good fight.
Oh, Braden, you got a vicious one!
Good luck, hunter. Speed and accuracy be yours. We are all depending on you.
I'm just saying I wanna go on some missions. My blaster aim is pretty good.
Anything's better than sitting around with you and our gear. No offense, big guy.
None taken, little one. You are young and still crave adventure.
Hey, look who's back! How'd it go out there, girl? Find anything?
Hey, look who's back! How'd it go out there, hotshot? Find anything?
Vexx left a datapad at his safe house.
I found this.
Great! Give it over and I'll see what I can make of it.
I found out that I enjoy killing gangsters. A lot.
A love for bloodshed.
You will have no trouble indulging that passion on this world.
Mind your own business. Let me mind mine.
Knock off the questions.
Information is my business, laser brain.
Is that crusty datapad you're holding so tight the only thing you've got? Let me have a look.
You show much natural skill. I'm honored to join you on the Great Hunt.
What were you two doing while I was gone?
Any news on your end?
Heh. Same as me--taking care of all the boring details so you don't have to.
The pleasure's all mine, big guy.
Right back at you.
Well, look who's in a generous mood today.
At least until I find a real crew, anyway.
You should be.
Don't listen to her, Jory. She thinks her mean streak passes for a sense of humor.
Don't listen to him, Jory. He thinks his mean streak passes for a sense of humor.
Hey, Braden! How was Nem'ro's palace? Are we getting our hunter in to see this Hutt?
I've laid the groundwork, but we're not there yet. What've you got?
Datapad from Vexx's safe house. Cracked the encryption in record time! Check out that last entry....
Our boy Vexx keeps detailed records. There's a receipt here for a shuttle ticket he bought today. We'll have to move fast!
Check out Vexx's safe house. See if we can't learn something useful.
We're almost set up. See if you can't get that security network running, Mako.
Sure thing, Braden. We'll be--hey now....
Hey, indeed--the main attraction is here. Team, this is the girl we're pinning all our hopes on.
Hey, indeed--the main attraction has arrived. Team, this is the man we're pinning all our hopes on.
Best shot I've ever seen and nerves of steel. She's Great Hunt material, all right.
Best shot I've ever seen and nerves of steel. He's Great Hunt material, all right.
What do you say, hunter? Ready to meet your team?
Is that who these people are?
You mean them?
My team... I like the sound of that.
Absolutely.
Get used to the idea. To win the Great Hunt, you'll need support, structure and intel.
What I'm ready to do is make a pile of credits.
When do I get paid?
A girl after your own heart, Jory.
A man from your same mold, Jory.
I do admit to a fondness for material stability.
Let's do things official-like. This is Mako, a little genius I picked up years ago on Nar Shaddaa. She provides intel and tech.
Hope you're as good as the old man says!
And the big bruiser is Jory. He handles the heavy lifting and provides security for our base of operations.
Greetings. I am at your disposal. Feel free to make us all incredibly wealthy and famous.
Nice to meet you both. Let's get to work.
Hello, all.
Cute girls and big guns. I'm sold.
Looks like a good mix.
Are you and this little girl an item, Jory?
You make a cute couple.
I'm not sure what you mean, "item"?
Just do your jobs and keep out of my way.
You two work for me, got it?
You're a real ray of sunshine, aren't you?
All right, enough introductions. Down to business. We're here because the Great Hunt has been called.
Little Mako is the most rabid fan of hunter history this side of Geonosis--and even she doesn't know exactly what the Great Hunt entails.
I do know the names of every Great Hunt winner, though: Bloodworthy, the Defenestrator, Jewl'a Nightbringer....
Every bounty hunter who's won a Great Hunt went on to massive glory and riches--which is why we're here.
What's our first move?
Sounds right.
You can keep your glory. I just wanna be rich.
I'm here for credits.
You see? This woman understands the way the galaxy works.
You see? This man understands the way the galaxy works.
Personally, I'm just here to kill people and cause damage.
Can I shoot things, already?
Then you won't be bored, because we aren't here to make friends.
Here's what I know so far. The Great Hunt has two groups: the Mandalorian elite and the freelance bounty hunters sponsored by influential crime lords.
There's no time to make you a Mandalorian. That means you need a sponsor.
Nem'ro the Hutt runs this stinking little town. I've got just enough pull with that gangster to get you an introduction.
Let's go get that introduction, then.
So we've got a plan.
Hold on--we've got to lay some groundwork, first.
So, Nem'ro sponsors me and I'm in the Great Hunt?
All I need is an introduction?
That's the idea. Of course, nothing's ever that easy.
Enough talk--let's get moving.
Less chat, more action.
I like your enthusiasm, but you don't just walk in to see Nem'ro the Hutt. Not yet.
Mako, scan for every bounty in the area. I want the nastiest, most brutal, untouchable scum you can find.
I'm on it, Braden. One nasty character coming up....
We need to get you situated as a big-time hunter, at least as far as the locals know. Then we contact Nem'ro.
Mako will plant rumors about your offworld exploits, but you have to take down someone impressive--and local--to sell that reputation.
You find a target and I'll take it down hard.
Just point me the right way.
How's that scan coming, Mako?
Is there anything that little girl can't do?
Mako seems useful.
She can't handle a gun like you can--or we wouldn't need you, would we?
You better know what you're doing, Braden.
Make sure this works.
Or what? You'll go find your own Hutt contacts? Don't worry--I know the score here.
Found something. Check this out... Vexx: Corellian, champion quick-draw artist, wanted for robbing fifteen Imperial military pay stations.
Of all places to get credits, why would a sane being rob an Imperial pay station?
Perfect. This Vexx is either a madman or a glory hound--and he's obviously dangerous.
How can we be sure Vexx is here on Hutta?
Is the intel solid?
What else do you know about Vexx, Mako?
Give me every detail.
Vexx is dead already. He just doesn't know it.
I'm more dangerous.
Says here Vexx has a safe house in the bad part of town, right in the heart of the madness. That'll be fun.
Nem'ro the Hutt's enemy took over part of this town. It's dangerous poking around in there, but it's your best shot.
Raid Vexx's safe house and look for something that might help us track him down. But be ready for anything.
Excuse me, but I have a safe house to shoot up.
I'm ready for everything.
Be safe out there.
Don't tell me how to do my job, Braden.
Who's the hunter here?
Have it your way. That attitude gets a lot of hunters fried their first time out, though. Good luck.
The rest of you get to stay here?
No backup?
We're setting up the support system so you can build a reputation. Now get to it.
I don't know you, kid.
